content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #163

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Request event type"session-timeout"

Submitted by Ron Parker on behalf of Kenn Sinn
HL7 Canada (ken.sinn@ehealthontario.on.ca )
Chapter/section: Event Catalog
Url: http://fhircast.org/specification/May2019Ballot/#event-catalog
Type: A-S Enhancement
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Request event type"session-timeout"

Comment: Request for a new event "session-timeout" event, which includes both idle-timeout and user-timeout (i.e. fixed maximum login duration). This would allow all subscribers to also timeout, in the event that user-logout event has not been initiated.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #163

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Request event type"session-timeout"

Submitted by Ron Parker on behalf of Kenn Sinn
HL7 Canada (ken.sinn@ehealthontario.on.ca )

Type: A-S Enhancement
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Request event type"session-timeout"

Comment: Request for a new event "session-timeout" event, which includes both idle-timeout and user-timeout (i.e. fixed maximum login duration). This would allow all subscribers to also timeout, in the event that user-logout event has not been initiated.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #163

Resolution: Persuasive with Mod

Clarify meaning of the user-logout event to indicate that the user has been logged out, either through a time-out or a logout or other reasons and in the case of a user-specific session, the hub SHALL also send a hub.mode=denied event.

Affirmative/Abstention/Negative: 14/0/0
Mover: Isaac, Ken

wmaethner labeled Issue #163

isaacvetter edited a comment on Issue #163

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ken Sinn

Disposition:Â Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment: Clarify meaning of the user-logout event to indicate that the user has been logged out, either through a time-out or a logout or other reasons and in the case of a user-specific session, the hub SHALL also send a hub.mode=denied event.

:+1: For:Â 14
:expressionless: Abstain:Â 0
:-1: Against:Â 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

wmaethner closed Issue #163:
